Supply Chain+Logistics+Inbound Logistics.EXPLANATION: Measures the percentage of on-time deliveries from suppliers.
Supply Chain+Logistics+Inbound Logistics.FORMULA: (Number of On-Time Deliveries from Suppliers / Total Number of Supplier Deliveries) * 100

Supply Chain+Logistics+Inbound Logistics.EXPLANATION: Measures the cost of inbound transportation per unit of material.
Supply Chain+Logistics+Inbound Logistics.FORMULA: Total Inbound Transportation Costs / Total Number of Units Transported

Supply Chain+Logistics+Inbound Logistics.EXPLANATION: Measures the percentage of orders that meet the agreed-upon lead times.
Supply Chain+Logistics+Inbound Logistics.FORMULA: (Number of Orders Delivered On Time by Supplier / Total Number of Orders) * 100

Supply Chain+Logistics+Inbound Logistics.EXPLANATION: Measures the accuracy of supplier deliveries against order specifications.
Supply Chain+Logistics+Inbound Logistics.FORMULA: (Number of Accurate Deliveries from Suppliers / Total Number of Deliveries) * 100

Supply Chain+Logistics+Inbound Logistics.KPIS: Inventory turnover rate for inbound materials
Supply Chain+Logistics+Inbound Logistics.EXPLANATION: Measures how often inventory is turned over for inbound materials.
Supply Chain+Logistics+Inbound Logistics.FORMULA: Cost of Goods Sold for Inbound Materials / Average Inventory for Inbound Materials

Supply Chain+Logistics+Inbound Logistics.KPIS: Percentage of inventory damaged in transit
Supply Chain+Logistics+Inbound Logistics.EXPLANATION: Measures the proportion of inventory damaged during transit.
Supply Chain+Logistics+Inbound Logistics.FORMULA: (Amount of Inventory Damaged in Transit / Total Amount of Inventory Shipped) * 100

Supply Chain+Logistics+Inbound Logistics.EXPLANATION: Measures the total number of quality issues reported from suppliers.
Supply Chain+Logistics+Inbound Logistics.FORMULA: Total Count of Quality Issues Reported with Suppliers

Supply Chain+Logistics+Inbound Logistics.EXPLANATION: Measures how quickly suppliers respond to urgent orders.
Supply Chain+Logistics+Inbound Logistics.FORMULA: (Number of Urgent Orders Fulfilled by Supplier on Time / Total Number of Urgent Orders) * 100
